features: KEEP YOUR DOCUMENTS PROTECTED - Made from durable .2mm thick polypropylene, PocketFiles will protect your files from spills and debris. Each PocketFile holds up to 75 sheets.
NEVER BUY MANILA FILES AGAIN! - Traditional paper file folders tear easily, allow documents to fall out, and leave you guessing as to what's inside

TRANSPARENT FOR FAST IDENTIFICATION - PocketFiles come in assorted, transparent colors that provide a clear view of file contents for fast identification. New sets of 18 now include more colors: 3 each of purple, orange, red, yellow, green, and blue.

SEALED ON TWO SIDES - PocketFiles are sealed on two sides for extra security and easy loading, and to protect materials from falling out. Acid-free polypropylene ensures that photos, slides, and disks can be archived for years to come with no risk of damage.
PERFECT COMPANION FOR HANGING FILES - PocketFiles fit neatly into hanging files, and include white adhesive index labels for easy identification

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This wasn't a first time purchase. I order these every year for my monthly financial records. Easy to use when active and making payments. Records secure and easy to find as I color code by quarters. I love these folders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these - they keep me organized for all my meetings and keep all my papers in one place and in order

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty colors for folders
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to upgrade my frequently used file folders at my desk at work to something more durable. These are nice, like the colors. they work well I just was hoping for something a little more sturdy when sitting vertical in a step up file holder, these work but tend to druop after a bit. Note that not both sides are open one is sealed shut which is not a huge big deal, but if you have thick files to place it may make it a bit difficult to hold everything. The are also translucent in color so you can see anything you have in them so if your looking for folders that you want to put confidential info and keep on a desk or something these would not be a good fit, you would have to put another paper in to cover up what you dont want visiable. The other downfall is the tab is really small compared to regular file folders so if you like to print your labels to put on them you have to have a smaller label the regular sized file folder labels are too big. but the labels stick nice and dont appear to be falling off so thats a plus. I think they are nice & I like them just some small issue I had to work around in order to use as I had envisioned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Company customer service is excellent and so is the product.
reviews.reviewText: I have only had this product a few days. While using it for the first time, I found that I had received an extra blue file and was short one yellow file. I called customer service with this minor inconvenience and was greeted with respect and genuine appreciation for the issue. Rather than have me return the product and wait for a replacement to arrive, they simply sent out an entire package. It was actually more cost effective for them to do that. I should note that the second package I received with my original order had the correct number of files and colors. Ditto for the replacement package - all files/colors present and accounted for. This is truly outstanding customer service!I noticed another reviewer said these files are too wide for the Pendaflex system. This is not correct. They fit easily into my existing Pendaflex file system. The files are well made and appear to be able to stand up to robust use. I would happily recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Second time ordering
reviews.reviewText: Durable and easy to read through. I keep frequently referenced documents for work in these and love how they keep me organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Office PocketFile™ Clear Poly Document Folder Project Pockets, 5th-Cut
reviews.reviewText: I use these all the time to separate what I am working on and to file away important papers. The colored folders make it easier to find in my files.
